content: समारुह् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} ({%a%}) To ascend or mount on; ride. ({%b%}) To ascend, rise. {@--2@} To undertake, engage in. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to rise or mount, raise, lift up. {@--2@} To string (as a bow). {@--3@} To plant. {@--4@} To ascribe, attribute. {@--5@} To hand or deliver over to. {@--6@} To display, exhibit, show forth.
